snippet: A new tradition at the Cannes Film Festival involves Harvey Weinstein previewing his slate for the year. Last year’s show included “Django Unchained,” “The Master” and “Silver Linings Playbook.” This year’s ranged from an auteur’s...
abstract: A new tradition at the Cannes Film Festival involves Harvey Weinstein previewing his slate for the year. Last year’s show included “Django Unchained,” “The Master” and “Silver Linings Playbook.” This year’s ranged from an auteur’s kung fu film to a biopic of Nelson Mandela.

headline.main: Cannes Film Festival: The Harvey Weinstein Show
